That's all folks!
Be sure to follow @ThePIX_tez and my creators: @Shamanovitch (dev/project) @Anderlaxe (art/pixelart/hype monster) and @Matthieu_masta (our website, have a look) on Twitter!

Go check our collection website, allowing you to see your PIX score, read every game mechanics and do deep research about the system: 

>>> https://the-pix.xyz/ <<<<

The PIX is an EVIL production. Follow @Evilcoin_tez to get in touch about our new projects and the EVIL artist collective!
